security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and methodology. No code execution, file system access, network calls, environment variable access, or external commands were detected. The skill provides a structured framework for organizing context across 7 layers in YAML/Markdown format.

content.value_statement: Managing long AI conversations and complex projects leads to context loss and semantic drift. Context7 provides a 7-layer framework to organize project information, decisions, and progress into stable, reusable structures that maintain cognitive continuity across tasks and sessions.
actual_capabilities: Organizes context into 7 hierarchical layers from meta-info to testing
Labels information with validity markers like [VALID], [DEPRECATED], [PENDING]
Tracks progress with sprint status, completed items, and blockers
Documents architecture decisions with ADR format
Records issues and solutions for future reference
Enables context reuse across multiple AI conversation sessions
limitations: Does not execute code or modify files automatically
Requires manual maintenance and updates by the user
Does not integrate with external tools or APIs
Only provides methodology, not automated implementation

use_cases.title: Track multi-module projects
use_cases.description: Organize complex Angular or enterprise projects with layered context that persists across development sessions

use_cases.title: Document architecture decisions
use_cases.description: Record ADR-style architecture decisions with full context, alternatives considered, and consequences

use_cases.title: Maintain long conversation context
use_cases.description: Structure information so AI assistants maintain coherence across extended reasoning chains

prompt_templates.title: Initialize project context
prompt_templates.prompt: Use Context7 to initialize a new [PROJECT_NAME] project. Set up all 7 layers: Meta (Layer 0), Domain Knowledge (Layer 1), Architecture Decisions (Layer 2), Implementation Details (Layer 3), Progress Tracking (Layer 4), Issues (Layer 5), and Testing (Layer 6).

prompt_templates.title: Record architecture decision
prompt_templates.prompt: Record an Architecture Decision Record in Context7 Layer 2 for [DECISION_TITLE]. Include: background, decision, alternatives considered, expected consequences, and status [PENDING/ADOPTED/DEPRECATED].

prompt_templates.title: Update progress tracking
prompt_templates.prompt: Review and update Context7 Layer 4 (Progress Tracking). Move completed items to [VALID], add new sprint goals, and mark any blockers with priority level.

prompt_templates.title: Document issue solution
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new issue entry in Context7 Layer 5. Document: problem title, discovery date, root cause analysis, solution code snippet, affected modules, and related documentation links. Set status to [SOLVED/IN_PROGRESS].

best_practices: Initialize all 7 layers at project start to establish complete context baseline
Update Layer 4 (Progress) at end of each sprint to maintain current state
Use consistent status markers ([VALID], [DEPRECATED], [PENDING]) across all layers
anti_patterns: Skipping Layer 0 meta-information loses project context for new sessions
Mixing implementation details with architecture decisions breaks layer separation
Leaving items in [PENDING] state without review creates outdated context

faq.question: Is Context7 compatible with Claude Code CLI?
faq.answer: Yes. Context7 works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code as a documentation framework for organizing context.

faq.question: What is the maximum context size supported?
faq.answer: Context7 does not enforce limits. The structure scales to project size. Each layer can be as detailed as needed.

faq.question: Can I integrate Context7 with version control?
faq.answer: Yes. Store the YAML/Markdown context files in your repository. They work alongside git for project documentation.

faq.question: Is my project data safe with Context7?
faq.answer: Context7 is a prompt-based methodology. All data remains in your conversations and files. No external data transmission.

faq.question: Why is my context not persisting between sessions?
faq.answer: Context7 requires manual transfer between sessions. Copy the structured context into each new conversation to maintain continuity.

faq.question: How does Context7 differ from traditional documentation?
faq.answer: Context7 uses 7 distinct layers with specific purposes and status markers, enabling AI to understand context hierarchy and relevance.
